statements: SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_total, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_total > 100;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1234;
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-10-31' ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_total FROM orders WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT MAX(order_total) AS max_order_total, MIN(order_total) AS min_order_total FROM orders
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, order_amount FROM orders WHERE order_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_lifetime_value FROM customers WHERE customer_lifetime_value < 500;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, order_amount FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_amount > 500 AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_lifetime_value FROM customers WHERE customer_lifetime_value > 1000 ORDER BY customer_lifetime_value DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_signup_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id ASC

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, customers.customer_name FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE orders.customer_id = 200 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 2;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(order_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(order_amount) AS max_order_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_name, average_order_value, lifetime_value FROM customers JOIN customer_insights ON customers.customer_id = customer_insights.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_amount FROM orders WHERE order_amount > 100
SELECT order_id, purchase_date FROM order_history ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_amount FROM orders WHERE order_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price < 50;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.customer_id, customers.customer_name, orders.order_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, avg_order_value FROM customer_stats WHERE avg_order_value > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, avg_order_value, lifetime_value FROM customers JOIN customer_stats ON customers.customer_id = customer_stats.customer_id;
